label:
This is an email notification that is sent to the creator of the bulletin post and the creator of the comment, when someone replies to a comment on the original bulletin post.
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##ActivityTitle## - Head description of bulletin
##FullName## - Name of the user who added a comment

template.subject: Bulletin - comment replied
template.body: ##FullName## has replied to a comment on the post: ##ActivityTitle##
